attributes.action: The Government needs to fund more money to schools
attributes.additional_details: The Government is only funding under £42 billion making it £4,700 per primary school student and £6,200 per secondary school students. The Government is funding State Pensions for over £60 billion and Benefits for over £100 billion. Surely, there can some cuts to other things that the Government funds in order to allow every student to recieve the proper education they deserve?
attributes.background: The Government should fund more in schools as cuts and other negative factors are being made. Students are now paying for their own equipment, textbooks, etc for over £30 which some cannot afford. Not all students have that luxery. This limits students recieving the education for their dream career.
